document_data.caption: A map of the Shining Sea.
document_data.name: Shining Sea
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shining Sea''' was one of the great seas of [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Geography: The sea stretched from the coastline of [[Chult]] in the south, to the shoreline of [[Calimshan]] in the north. The Shining Sea had a large amount of trade and traffic. It was quite large, although it was not as large as the [[Trackless Sea]] or the [[Sea of Swords]].
document_data.Inhabitants: A rare beautiful species of intelligent [[firebird]]s dwelt across the Shining Sea, in seclusion, away from prying eyes. These birds were legendary among [[Chultan (ethnicity)|Chultans]] for their perfect beauty, but they were also infamous for their horrible shrieks the birds themselves called "singing."
